0: #BREAKING | Terrorists attacked an #IndianArmy vehicle in #Kathua district of #JammuAndKashmir. According to initial inputs, armed terrorists had fired on an army vehicle in Machedi area of Billawar in Kathua district. However, soldiers retaliated and an encounter has ensued in the area.

On July 5, a joint effort by the police and the Airforce successfully defused an undetonated World War II bomb discovered in Bhulanpur, located in West Bengal's Jhargram district. 

The bomb was found on July 5, prompting the evacuation of residents within a 1-kilometer radius of the site.

#news #westbengal #worldwar2
